A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A lot of people seem angry that this movie didn't play out the way they wanted\, and are giving it terrible reviews because of it. Not to say this movie is without faults (flying Leia\, and dropping bombs in space)\, but the fact that everything is this movie was unpredictable\, and the subtle character arcs that completely change the course of the story\, make it one of my favorite Star Wars movies yet.
